revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 79:;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, copper drachma (that of priests) drachmas 4;;Chairemon, his son, mother Tbelles, copper drachma (that of priests) drachmas 4;;Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Esouris, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Deios, son of Petheus, grandson of Heras, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Esouris, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollauthis, copper drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Onnophris, grandson of Onnophris, mother Sopas, copper drachmas 4;;Tasoucharion, daughter of Apollonios (Harpakysis);;(in left margin: drachmas 104 obols 28) geometria of year 12 drachmas 101, surcharges drachmas 7 obols 2, in total drachmas 107 obols 2;;in total for the day drachmas 164 obols 28.;(Epeiph) 7 likewise:;Didymos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis, copper drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Herieus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tlemenesis, drachmas 4;;Sisois, son of Naaraus the younger, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Heron, grandson of Horos, mother Tasoucharion, copper drachmas 8;;Apynchis, son of Petermouthis, grandson of Apynchis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 32.;(Epeiph) 8 likewise:;Theabennis, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaesis, copper drachmas 4;;Horos the younger, son of Hatres, grandson of Horos, mother Teraus, copper drachmas 4;;Petsiris, son of Pasion, grandson of Petsiris, mother Taonnophris, copper drachmas 4;;Patkonnis, son of Mysthes, grandson of Patkonnis, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Heron, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Eserempis, drachmas 4 copper drachmas 4;;Protarchos, son of Leonides, grandson of Anchophis, mother Herais, drachmas 8;;Orsenouphis, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Petaus, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Segathis, copper drachmas 4;;Limnaios, son of Onnophris, grandson of Satabous, mother Ptolema, drachmas 8;;in total for the day drachmas 56;;Epeiph 9 likewise:;Pnepheros, son Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 16 copper drachmas 4;;Kames, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Ptollion, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, copper drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Phaesis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tanais, drachmas 4;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapetheus, copper drachmas (that of priests) 4;;in total for the day drachmas 40.;(Epeiph) 10 likewise:;Tanomgeus, daughter of Pakysis (wife of Maximus Picer);(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 12) geometria of year 12 drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 4.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 13 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;Ptolemaios, son of Doras, grandson of Apollonios, mother Tauris, drachmas 4;;Horion, son of Lupus, grandson of Horos, mother Ammonaris, drachmas 8."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
